casebody.data:
No. 10,

Misc.

Pointer v. Texas. Orville A. Harlan for petitioner-. Waggoner Carr, Attorney General of Texas, and Gilbert J. Pena and Alio B. Crow, Jr., Assistant Attorneys General, for respondent.

Motion for leave to proceed 'in forma pauperis and petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas granted. Case transferred to the appellate docket.
